Articles.Content: Is there a mod so that when the light key (L) is pressed, the lights inside cockpits, command pods etc. also turns on?

Not that I know of. "U" is the default key for turning on all vehicle lights. I may be mistaken, but I think it only works for light parts that use the ModuleLight module. Not sure if works on lights that use other modules like AnimateGeneric, or custom light modules like seen in the Surface Lights add-on. 

Easiest solution is to just use action groups. I think you can bind the interior lights to the lights action group.

Yes there is, thanks to the wise and powerful Snark!  http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/125832-105-defaultactiongroups-v10-cockpit-lights-in-light-action-group-and-more/
